page.shortlink: ux list column props initial sort direction
page.description: Defines the initial sort direction for a column in the List Layout.

discussion.p: When you define the sort action for a column in a List control you can set the initial sort direction. If the column is unsorted when the user clicks on the column heading, the initial sort direction is defined by the *[ui:Initial sort direction]* property.
To set the initial sort direction, set the *[ui:Initial sort direction]* property in the List Builder for the selected column. The sort direction can be one of the following:

item.name: Ascending
item.description: Sort the list rows in ascending order. (Default)

item.name: Descending
item.description: Sort the list rows in decending order.

page.note: The Grid component has similar capacity to set the initial sort direction.
